hero_subtitle: Fusion Dining & Sunset Cocktails in Haad Rin
hero_tagline: Where East meets West under the Koh Phangan sunset
about_text: Experience the perfect fusion of flavors at Moon Spoon, where innovative cuisine meets tropical island vibes. Our sunset terrace offers breathtaking views while you savor our signature fusion dishes and crafted cocktails.
footer_moon_family: Part of the Moon Family ‚Äì Koh Phangan üåï
menu_tuna_tartare_desc: Fresh tuna with Thai herbs, lime, and crispy shallots
menu_spring_rolls_fusion_desc: Prawn, avocado, and mango with sweet chili sauce
menu_pork_belly_desc: Slow-cooked pork belly with star anise and tamarind glaze
menu_ceviche_desc: Fresh fish marinated in coconut milk, lime, and Thai spices
menu_dumplings_desc: Chicken and lemongrass dumplings with soy-ginger dipping sauce
menu_pad_thai_fusion_desc: Classic pad thai with fresh herbs and crispy salmon
menu_curry_risotto_desc: Creamy risotto infused with Thai green curry and basil
menu_beef_massaman_desc: Tender beef short rib in rich massaman curry with roasted peanuts

menu_sea_bass_desc: Whole sea bass with lemongrass, lime, and Thai herbs
menu_prawn_curry_desc: Tiger prawns in spicy coconut curry with kaffir lime leaves
menu_squid_desc: Tender grilled squid with chili-lime dipping sauce

menu_vegetable_curry_desc: Mixed vegetables in yellow curry with coconut milk
menu_mango_sticky_rice_desc: Traditional dessert with fresh mango and coconut cream
